page.title: 06LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: ADULT'S LEISURE ACTIVITIES by Joanne aged 11:When my mother comes home she makes food for all the family.When we have eaten she washes the dishes and goes into the living room.In her spare time she watches T.V. and reads books.Sometimes she is afraid to read alone because she likes reading books like "Dracula" or "Haunted House". When my father comes home my mother makes food for him then he goes out to the garden and does some gardening which he enjoys.Whenever he sees a garden he goes up to it and always does something to it.He also builds grates and Knocks walls down in my house.My favourite hobby is making cakes and washing my socks.I also like gardening because my father helps me.
